content: Ever since I updated the app, it freezes on a blank screen with the multicolored bar that shows it "thinking" and never loads to the appropriate screen. So I can't login, can't do anything. The search bar occasionally loads but after you hit go, it just goes to that white loading screen. I've rebooted device and have uninstalled and reinstalled the app. Never have I had this issue until now. I'm using Galaxy s8+ also did this on my s7

When you click an Amazon link in another app like WhatsApp, there is no option for opening it with the Amazon app so you have to open it with a browser and log in again. Very frustrating. If a friend sends me a link and I open it, it opens in a browser. Often I don't bother opening links for this reason. This has been a problem for a while. You deserve to lose out on sales for not fixing it

Continually having trouble connecting to the site, app freezes and says the page isn't available, but if I run WiFi off and back on it will appear. Never had issues like this until recently upgrading to Google pixel 3 phone. Have checked all app permissions and continued sporadic results. In addition, Amazon has not responded to this issue. Horrible

This app is solid for the most part. When it is working, which I'd say is about 85% of the time, it works as well as anyone could expect. That other 15% is insta-closing or not starting up at all. Which is incredibly frustrating. Sometimes I see a flash of the app main page. Other times tapping the app to open it results in absolutely nothing at all. When the app gets into these fits (which isnt all that often, but one time is too many) restarting my phone does nothing to remedy. Amazon website still works fine during this. As does Amazon video app. Its solely an issue with the shopping app it seems. This is incredibly annoying as I shouldn't have to resort to the desktop site because someone cant iron out the faults of an app that shouldn't have this kind of problem.

While it's less annoying than using amazon on desktop, it has way too many glitches. It's worse than tumblr and that's saying something. It crashes very often, takes a long time to load, will switch lists without reason, and will even duplicate a dozen or so items from one list and put it in a completely different one. I give it two stars instead of one because if amazon dealt with the glitches it would be pretty good.

Amazon is rubbish. There is no cancel order button, and order confirmation is so slow. Also the orders section doesn't show your orders unless you apply a filter, so I had no idea if my order went through. This led me to ordering twice and being billed and charged twice. Also their gift to a friend option is woeful. The recipient could not receive the gift I had bought due to amazon account region of the recipient. Total trash by Amazon.

Would be a great tool, enabling shopping from your mobile device, if it actually worked without glitches. The primary annoyance is the app failing to recognize your selection from the search results. When clicking on your choice, nothing occurs. It looks as though we will continue to use our laptops, if we don't choose the eBay app. Not our preference, but more convenient than logging in from our laptops...

Advertise special deals get charged full price. Went onto my laptop afterwards. I ordered several discounted items but could see the total price was wrong and yet you can't see the individual discounted price charged for individual items. I chatted online with a customer service rep who claimed I'd decided to choose the undiscounted price for 2 items!!! I've actually decided not to use amazon again. You can often find things cheaper elsewhere.

Existing app on phone quit working. Went to Google Play to update app - the only option option was to Install Amazon Shopping. The install repeatedly fails despite following troubleshooting error code 910. Now there is no Amazon app on my phone. Loved it before. Something similar happened a few years ago...different phone. Hoping this is resolved quickly.

I love Amazon Prime!! I almost dropped them one day because i ordered something on accident from 3rd party and like 1 minute afterwards, I cancelled it but the seller sent an email out about an hour later saying my item has been shipped !!!! Before I could even contact Amazon, Amazon sent me an email with the cancellation and my money returned to my account. love the perks and the service

I've waited a month to review this app because I thought it would be updated to fix the errors that keep popping up. I can open the app and it shows me the home page, but whenever I tap on any item it loads the page and then immediately swaps to a cute dog with a CS3 error. Same thing happens if I do a Google search of an item and I tap on an amazon listing. Cute dog error. This started happening around the first week of November and now I'm leaving a review one month later and no fix. Would be zero stars because it's unusable.

This is the worst, most nonfunctional app I have ever used. It just doesn't work. Pages don't load. Menus are unresponsive. Notifications for packages are several hours late. Its honestly really upsetting that a company with as much money as Amazon can't even make a halfway decent app. You're better off using the Amazon website in your mobile browser.

Delivery Sucks!! I was such a fan of Amazon and the app until my packages stopped being delivered. I honestly had no problem in the past, but I've had 3 packages either lost or delivered to wrong residences. The items are marked as delivered and no one is able to tell me what happened or where my money has gone. I'm done! I'll go back to the old school way of going into a store, paying a little more, and leaving with my purchase in hand.

Before using this app, i was not an amazon prime member. After finishing adding my items to my cart in the app, i proceeded to checkout. I arrived at a screen that had two options: sign up with prime today in a yellow button or continue without prime in blue. I selected the second option but the app did not respond or proceed. I tried this multiple times, going back and returning to this same screen and still unable to proceed. I finally pressed the first option which put me at the confirmation screen where all my items had prime shipping options. I immediately went on the website to deactivate prime but the prime items and shipping options remained. I talked to a representative from Amazon, Rasmi, who was unable to deactivate the prime and said i was stuck with it for the rest of the month and would lose free trial options. All this took place within the span of 30 minutes and i hadn't even finished my order. I am very disappointed in the app, this seems like a deceptive practice to force customers to sign up for prime

Amazon is the first place I go to search for any item I need because I know that most likely they're going to have the cheapest price, and if you don't want it knew you can also find your item used. And don't forget about all the extra features like Amazon Fire TV and everything like that! This is an amazing app that anybody should have and for an extra hundred bucks a year you get free 2-day shipping on everything you order plus free TV free movies and even have your groceries delivered. This is an all-around app, if you're living in 2018 and forward you got to have it.

I can't click on tabs (my basket„ÄÅmy account„ÄÅ search)„ÄÅits like the app is frozen but I'm able to scroll on the current page fine. If I don't completely shut down the app and try to use the app again later I continuously get "oops page not found" errors. I find myself having to completely restart the app every few hours. For a big company like Amazon their app on android should be as efficient as apple. This is ridiculous

This app use to work perfectly fine but now every time I click on something to look at it in a closer view from the search bar the screen changes from the item and says "oops something went wrong on our end." This happens EVERY single time I click on an item I wish to look at. The app has been updated to recent update as well.

Completely Broken This app is great until I try to buy something. Even though I am logged in, upon clicking proceed to checkout from the cart screen I get a device cannot be authenticated error message and my cart is erased. I have tried rolling back and reinstalling the update to no avail. A shopping app is useless if it won't allow one to make a purchase. Fix it and I will change my rating.

When you search for prime items, non prime items are mixed in with the results. Delivery date changes after order is placed to a later date. Amazons delivery service has degraded since relying on the USPS. You're hard pressed to ever get Prime two-day delivery anymore. Also USPS lies about attempted deliveries. They do not leave a pink re-delivery slip, which tells you they did not attempt a delivery. They lie on the report so when you contact Amazon, they will tell you they tried but no one was home and there was no safe place to leave the package, then the next day or two it shows up left by the front door. Mysteriously, the security of my front porch changed. Seeing that more and more Prime items are higher priced than non prime items, Prime is no longer worth the money.

Having troubles with AmazonSmile trial! I prefer using amazonsmile, and for that tend to defer from the app when making my final purchase. But recently when I open the app it indicates that as a trial I can use amazonsmile if I turn on the notifications, and even though all notifications are turned on in the app, it still thinks they are not. I would very much appreciate this feature being fixed.

THIEVES! I ordered an item a month ago on sale for $203. The item was in stock for weeks, still no delivery notice. I called cust service who seemed helpful, they apologized for the inconvenience, offered 1 day shipping & a $5 credit. When I hung up I got a message stating the order was canceled. Went through the app to chat with cust service. They told me to order again @ full price & they would adjust it & transferred me 8 times & they all refused to return the $75 I was tricked into spending.

This app is much faster than the old Amazon app. However, Amazon deliberately groups all notifications, including package delivery and advertisements, into a single notification category. Then, they disable unrelated features of the app, such as AmazonSmile, to try to get you to turn notifications back on.

The application does not work at all on my phone (Kyrocero Brigadier). Will display the home screen for a moment, then an error message. Same thing when trying to create an account, error message. Tried a dozen times. Now I remember why I uninstalled it the first time. Everything works fine on my Kindle...

It's very glitchy. Some pages take forever to download and I often get "oops!" errors where the page just crashes. It's not easy to shop either because it doesn't show enough titles for items, so you have to rely on the thumbnail pic to determine what you're looking for.

It's way easier to order via the website and I'm not sure the point of the app or the benefit this app provides. It's much harder to login in to, and when searching on the web it sometimes doesnt link or get to the correct page after clicking on an amazon link. Overall, not really much of a point to this app. Just buy it on the website.

Many of the reviews I read were specifically about Amazon, rather than the app. I find the App easy to navigate, use, and order from. No issues regarding the App. Amazon itself, also no complaints. careful on clothes orders from other countries!! But really, no problems.

What are y'all doing? I get a notification from the other amazon app that support for it will end soon and to switch to this one so I download it. it seems good and I go through "geeky finds" and every item I click on takes me back to home page even on other lists. That does not do me any good. The regular app works better. Thankfully the rest of the app seems to work the same.

I have an Amazon Prime Account. I get most of the gifts I buy for people, my preschool classroom decorations, unique stuff that I just love and tons of other stuff from Amazon. I shop more on Amazon than anywhere else! I have found some of the most beautiful and amazing stuff on this app! With the prime account I get my stuff in just a couple of days. I have only been disappointed one time in the hundreds of times I've used Amazon! The key is to read reviews and carefully research before you buy. Oh and also it has options where you can change the shipping address to deliver gifts directly to someone's door. I have shipped lots of gifts to three different households in another state with absolutely zero issues. Amazon truly is a beautiful thing and very highly recommended!

All in all a great experience with the app. For some reason I can no longer get this app to open from web links in an email in my Outlook app. Everything keeps opening in Chrome and there seems to be no way to force this app to open for the list of supported urls.

This latest update has been extremely frustrating for a guy that buys hundreds of items from Amazon and frequently uses this app. I'm continuously getting a "UH-OH Something went wrong our end" message (with the photo of a pooch) whenever I go to an item. It happens as stuff on the page is loading. Yes, I'm using an old Note 3 with Android 5.0 and all the latest updates, but Amazon, keep it compatible. I've removed and reinstalled the app with no change. Please fix!

This app has several issues: First it seems much slower to load than the previous version that is being phased out. Second has failed to fully load pages several times on my first hour of use (resulting in loading error pop-ups). Third why switch the apps when the original works well? I don't like it, needs work.

Good app, but I would like to see more security features on the app considering the personal information it holds, and possibility for someone to make unauthorised purchases. 1. I would like to see the option for a pin/fingerprint log in to the app 2. Remove the display bar which shows your postcode whilst browsing. There is no need for it.

Something is wrong with the app. I haven't been able to use it to do any holiday shopping. It constantly pops up with a dog saying theres a problem and returns to the home page. There's no way of contacting anyone about this issue. Whats the point of paying for prime to get prime shipping if you can't use the app!? Amazon lost a lot of business from me this year because of this problem.

I love this app i love amazon, everything you order is always on time or even sooner, and its actual name brand as shown not knock off like other companies. ive not had a single problem and the variety of items sold is down right amazing. This company exceeds expectations. Ive discontinued using my other apps because of the features. Always on time always name brand not much more needed. Its everything your looking for when it comes down to it. Keep it up Amazon.

Icon relic outdated. App interferes with my internet browsing and errors every time I use an amazon link with Samsung Internet. Samsung browser has easy "night mode" setting. Chrome is "Simplified view" night mode when available. Uninstalled this Amazon app. If fixed for Chrome, fix Samsung Internet. With app, cannot browse without app error messages. Ugh.

Prime isnt worth it, 2 day shipping is sometimes a week+ shipping. Customer service through text and call are all foreigners who stick to a script, and rarely yields any actual help. The app is barely beneficial, you're better off using a web browser; or better yet, not order anything on Amazon. They dont even offer a discount or anything regarding packages coming in a week later than their offered two day shipping. Was a decent prime shopper for years, cant deal with them not caring.

The checkout won't let me complete the transaction without signing up for Prime. The link is there to select the opt out and just pay option but the ability to click on it is disabled. This renders the app useless for non-Prime users. Bad time of year to have a bug. Needs to be fixed asap.

I'm using Amazon for a couple years now but in the last two weeks there app is completely stopped working. I have already uninstalled it and reinstalled it twice I have no other problems with any other apps on my phone. This had better get fixed quick Walmart's nipping on your heels.

I loved Amazon so much and this app was great, until recently when Amazon changed their shipping. Now, instead of professionals delivering it on time, we get regular people doing this as some form of part time job. I'm paying for prime but no longer get my items in two days, more like a week now and if I'm not home, they don't leave it. Even when it fits in the mailbox and even when it was cheap. The drivers are so pressured to make the delieveries on time, that many druve recklessly. I do understand that sometimes things happen and I wouldn't even mind if it arrived a few days late, but a week in absurd. Unless they fix their shipping, they have completely lost me as a customer.

Serious bug with duplicate orders! If you place an order for an item and then background the app on the order confirmation page and then dont return to the app for awhile (for me it was more than a day) when you return the confirmation page will refresh, and without your knowledge an additional order will be created. This has happened to me several times in the last month.

It's Amazon, so it is what you expect and hear. Easy to find things, you have a question about a product and the community or seller will answer. I've had to call customer service before due to UPS losing a package and they refunded my money the next day, easy and painless. Now, I didn't give it 5 stars because the app itself will randomly close on me and then not let me open the app until I restart my phone. I do not know if this is an issue with the app itself or if it is my Note 8's fault.

Well the app used to be great. Easy to navigate, easy to find what I was looking for quite quickly. Now I'm forced on to this version of the app since I got a new phone, this one sucks. Horrible navigation, takes forever to find anything. Really wish I hadn't been forced into downgrading to this crappy version of the app.

Love Amazon, very useful. Wish they offered more movies and shows with prime. Amazon should add The Simpsons to prime video, Having the Simpsons available on prime video would be beneficial for Amazon and viewers. They should also add The Fairly Odd Parents (TV Show) to prime. I am very disappointed and upset Amazon (Company) does not put binge worthy shows and movies on prime, it's mostly a lot of awful shows with no interest to watch. Amazon could do better with their video collection.

During the canada post strike amazon prime members are were unable to use the app properly . Packages were delayed, i missed out on sales because the system or app was unable to ship it another way and fullfill the offer of 2-3 days shipping. Also when returning a product it takes more than 3 days to see a refund . I trust them with my credit card and payment , so why dont they trust us a d refund soon as they see the product was returned usuing their postage. It should be faster. They theoretically could charge a credit card in case of dishonorable returns

The app itself works, but it staims images onto my screen for about am hour after the app closes. For example, I use the app real quick to buy something, close it, and the shopping cart icon can still be seen on my home screen, browser Windows, everywhere.

while shopping with this the first time, I couldn't click on half of the items to read about the items reviews similar items etc. so I uninstalled it and I am going to keep using the old version that works fine. I doubt they will not let me order for it no matter what it says about the app won't be supported anymore. there a company that runs off of us, and our money. maybe they will fix this version one day

Whenever I use the one click option to buy items you add a duplicate item to my cart. If I catch it, I can cancel but three times I have not been able to in time which created a return chore for me. Contacted Amazon customer service and no one cared for the needless work and shipping this causes.

Useful app great UI. the Sort and filter could do with update as it seems to either work great and help you find what you're looking for, or it makes the results totally irrelevant and sends me in the completely opposite direction.

before make any purchases from any place its best so shop around. Amazon has access to nearly anything one may think of and definitely is competitive in pricing. everyone should have this app. also the subscription to prime video included makes it that much better. if you haven't already it would be a good idea to sign up for prime. also, its rare packages are late and today was my first time ever contacting them. 8 min call resolved the isse in full.

Amazon is great for me for looking up reviews, comparing prices, and every once in awhile, ordering something. However, the scanner on the app doesn't work 90% of the time. I'm trying to scan in a gift card I got for Christmas, and it just won't work. It's either that or ill have to manually type in a 30 digit number...

The app can be convenient for browsing or shopping; however, it often displays a "Uh-oh something went wrong on our end" message before redirecting me to the home screen. This happens very frequently and often in the middle of viewing items.

The delivery is always on time but when you open it, either the product is of different design or defective or broken..8/10 times, I have either replaced or refunded.. and 2 times I have kept the products as I was fed up of replacing them..Moreover the products available in the market at lesser price as compared to Amazon...The products sold on this site are not tested before sending to the customer..

I have been trying to install this app for over 10 hours. It hasn't downloaded and installed on my new Pixel 3. Shows as "installed when i log in to the play store on a computer, but the it app is not installed on my phone. was finally able to get it installed after a lot of tries.

SO! came home from deployment as an active US NAVY sailor for the holidays. I decided to order all parts needed to build a brand new computer from scratch, after placing all needed parts to build my computer and only having a week and a half of home time I was so excited for the arrival of all parts to come in, BUT! after four days of placing the order and having all $1500 come out of my account, AMAZON  decides to not only canceled my order without notice but also erase all evidence of it! after calling several times and speaking to a so call SUPERVISOR, not only am I not getting my orders in time for Christmas or at all, I can't get my money refunded in time either.  I expressed my departure right after the break and AMAZON showed no sympathy  for either my items or my money. Thanks for your support to the military. NOT!!!!!!!!

It's unbelievable how one of the biggest companies of the world has such a bad app. It's inconvenient to shop through the app because you can't really scroll through product pictures. Additionally it takes years - no matter the internet connection - to load the pages of individual products

Once Amazon has been investigated and I have been refunded 187.99 me & my family will never use this corrupt moraless company again. I ordered 2 identical items both 187.99 each. I only recieved 1 parcel with only one of the items in it. I contacted the Amazon seller and they said they went 2 parcels on 1 track number. I thought that odd as two parcels would have 2 track numbers. So I contacted Hermes and they comfirmed its impossible. Amazon refused a refund. I have lost nearly 200 pounds.

I prefer the older Amazon app. The navy blue and orange colors just looked more professional and was easier on the eyes than this bright blue that makes it look unappealing and cheap. Just my opinion. I'm sure most would say the opposite.

I've loved the Amazon app for years. and then all of a sudden about 4 months ago, the app freaked out and will not let me view any products or order, so I have to open a browser in order to see more info & place any orders :/ I've tried updating & uninstalling and it makes no difference

This app is really good you can basically find anything on and I like it personally. The only thing is when I had ordered something they dropped it off and didn't knock and inside of the box my package was under taping and I was not happy at all. But overall I really enjoy there app Amazon!

I used to love Amazon and trust them with my life until I placed an order for an important Christmas gift, which was promised to be here today, but instead when I checked my account today there was a flag on the order stating it wouldnt get here until anywhere from 1-3 months from now! When I contacted customer service they said, "oops technical glitch, here's a $10 credit." whoop-ti-do. Don't think you can always trust their shipping times! Now I have to find another gift on Christmas Eve!

Whenever I scroll through the items with my wishlist tray open, things are accidentally "picked up" by my scrolling motion and automatically added to my wishlist, even though I'm not dragging them down to the tray (or intended to pick them up at all)! It's extremely annoying, please fix this.

Have been using Amazon since years but never happy with their sorting method. very difficult search for any item if we want to look for increasing price order and does not support many other sorting method. other websites and apps have much better sorting features.

The app is very insecure regarding the payment procedure. Secure purchase must require you to enter a PIN code or password or pattern to complete the purchase with the saved credit card. This app does not allow you to confirm the purchase, there is no way to put a password or to associate a fingerprint. They proudly call it the one click purchase!!! What if my phone is stollen or hacked?!!! It would be wise to just allow this option in the payment and security.

The app crashes constantly and then I have to re-install it. This happened about four times in a day while trying to buy gifts. I finally gave up and stopped using it. Now whenever I go to an amazon link on my phone they force you to try to install the mobile app.

Got the msg "Support for this app will stop soon." in old app today. Clicked on the "Install Now" and had this new app installed. I have not used the new app yet and cannot tell it is good or not. BUT, installing the new did NOT automactially uninstall the old. There is no option for me to uninstall the old app even going into the Android Apps.

I have been a loyal Amazon Prime customer for over 4 years always paying timely to receive the service they promise which is their two day shipping promise. Recently their prices have went up but their service has fell through the basement-Piss Poor!!! I have recieved several damaged packages, and purposely generic not as advertised products as well as damaged products. My last 3 orders in a row, in a week's time were all delayed and in addition I also had a total cancellation. Needless to say they did not meet their Mandatory Guaranteed two day shipping promise. I had to go through 3 or 4 people each time in customer service after constant rude disconnections and 3 failed promises to be called back/contacted to get the same false promises of immediately correcting and expedited my order..etc and how it wont happen again....for the 3rd time! Then far as the compensation goes I was offered a mere petty $5 promo each time and after I told them that is beyond under enough for the 3rd time they told me that was their max!?üò°ü§¨ All in all I missed dates for which I was buying gifts for people as well as vital necessities I needed for myself, I would not recommend you waste your money on this faulty false-advertising service through a company that over charges and doesn't value their loyal customers. I personally would recommend Walmart, they are free and you receive your orders timely! Dont waste your money or precious time and peace of mind with the headache and false claims of Amazon. I am discontinuing my service as of today!!!!

This is the Best when you purchase Amazon Prime because you get a lot of extras, like movies, music and games. Plus 2 day free shipping, all for less than $15 a month, I think it's $13.70 and that's with tax included.

I could not complete transaction without signing up for Amazon prime. Tried to press link to not sign up and it would not work, once I pressed button to sign up for prime, I could not find a way to undo it. Bad business practices. :-(

Amazon service is degrading day by day. Why cash on delivery option is not available on most of the products? I bought stuff by paying before, and later they said my package is lost and they didn't gave even the refund back. Not once but thrice the same had happened with me. I didn't knew Amazon have tie up with the thieves. Very pathetic service, better to go other online shopping companies....

They have problems with terrible delivery service, they knocked on your door put packages on steps and walk away, leaving packages on steps without knowing if you are home or not. Thats why so many packages are stolen. And they had a nerve to go into my account and take money and put it back and did this about four times until they got it right , that's not cool. When it was time to deliver my packages some came but the calm they could not deliver one due to address being wrong
The scrolling needs to be corrected. The category and location panels at the top of the screen cause the scrolling to not match the screen input. This creates a jarring and distracted experience.

Overall the app is very useful. I'm just docking it a couple of stars for the requirement to make me activate notifications as part of the Amazon smile beta. I don't like notifications, and trying to force me to get more advertising do that I can support charitable donations is greedy even for Amazon.

Suddenly not working... I used to use this app all the time but it must have updated fairly recently because he hasn't worked properly for weeks. I guess Amazon really does overwork it's employees if they don't have time to fix a glitch in their app that simplifies purchasing.
Since the update, the app keeps glitching and won't let me open it at all. Have to uninstall and reinstall to use it. Please fix! Have never had problems like this before.

I have been a prime member for a few years, now there's added taxes that are sneaked in, prime pantry is now an extra fee, when it never used to be, prime music as well. Don't think I'll be paying for prime next time around. I do find many things for cheaper than I would in stores, so 3 ‚òÜ

negative!!! i rarely order online, and every time i have ordered, my products always end up in the won't address, only once has it actually arrived at my location. I've been lucky that my neighbors have brought my items to me, but it's this kind of mistake that makes me not trust the company nor the drivers. Take kindergarten, obviously they don't know their address numbers!!!

This app extols its ability to help you find the right gift for someone. You'd think that would include some way to search for your friends wish lists, but unfortunately, that's not what this shoddy app is for. But you might be interested in this item that is, at best, tangentially related to something you bought once a year ago. Amazon is a terrible company.

Amazon has lost approx 5 packages in the last 2 months, unacceptable Amazon..the last one they will not even refund, so in order to give a gift I have to go buy it elsewhere, very disappointing....maybe someday it will show up at my door...so much for paying for Amazon prome for 2 day shipping...which by the way has gone up again grrrr..might be time to cancel..

my experience with Amazon shopping has always been a negative one. Their deliveries are never on time, their customer service I'll be kind with words does not reinsure anything, they don't stand by their guarantees, they don't stand by their shipments, it is absolutely the worst company I've ever worked with in my life and I actually pay for it monthly. As of today I'm canceling my membership because my dissatisfaction has been sold multiple I no longer can take it. They literally ruined xmas

I am driven to violent distraction by Amazon SPAM. There seems to be NO WAY to opt out from the continuous stream of "lightning deals" and "we thought you'd like"...SPAM. i have not ONCE been interested in any of the stuff they are peddling. EVERY ruddy time I connect to a Network they send another 'deal'. No more. the convenience of the app is far outweighed by the intrusion of the SPAM. uninstalling now.

I'm so over Amazon. I ordered a package last Thursday to be delivered next day and supposedly the carrier lost it. Customer service is garbage especially if you use the chat feature. I was chatting with a "manager" because the rep was rude and useless and she logged off and some other random person got on. They refunded my money for my "lost" package. I reordered items so they would come yesterday and wouldn't you know it my package is lost again! At this point I don't believe the carrier is losing all these packages I think Amazon is making same day delivery promises they can't keep. What good is prime if you don't get your stuff and customer service doesn't care?

Very very poor!! the App is rubbish and doesn't let you update you're payment methods. what a waste of time. customer service is also very poor. No response and when they do, they were not very helpful and couldn't even update payment method. just poor all round. still cannot resolve issue so therefore app and website id useless to me.
App is slow, stalls, and crashes repeatedly. It takes forever to do anything, especially trying to choose options for an item or view enlarged pictures.

Always the best! Best products, prices, availability, on-time (early!) shipping, returns, and their Customer Service is unsurpassed! Become a Prime member! So many benefits! It's like a central hub for life! I can't say enough good things!

So I downloaded this for the $15 off first time app user coupon, it popped up immediately after downloading but didn't have the time to shop around on the app at that moment, it never showed up again, was not emailed nor received a text with the coupon code. I guess that should be expected from a cheap skate like Bezos.
The app works ok but Amazon prime is one of the worst services ever they never deliver the package on time or they lose your order. This will definitely be my last time ordering anything from Amazon

I'm using an Asus Zenfone 5z and I keep getting an error that tells me to check my interner connection and try again though my internet is working perfectly fine. IDK if the issue is related to this model of phone but it makes it pretty much unusable for me. Have tried rebooting my phone and attempting to connect both on and off of wifi.

Cache won't clear. Stores old login information and doesn't clear no matter what. My Prime subscription ends this month and I won't pay for another. Give them an inch, they take a mile.
